issues.title: Add Save buttons at the bottom of the editor
issues.body: It's tedious to have to scroll up after doing chapters.

issues.title: suggest tags
issues.body:
proposal:
* allow hub owners to set a list of bookmarked tags, these will be selectable on the gallery editor screen
* scan galleries in the hub for frequently used tags
* scan galleries for specific combinations, particularly `series:x + artist:y`

the tag list could use:
* red for tags that cannot be added (syntax error)
* green for added tags
* blue for bookmarked tags
* yellow for computer-suggested tags
* purple for user-suggested tags (this would require changes to the gallery merger)

suggested tags can be `namespace:name`, but also just `namespace:` so that the owner can fill in the `name` part manually, `artist` and `series` should probably be recommended like this by default so that these aren't forgotten when adding a new library. (based on nekololi's suggestion)

clicking on a blue or yellow tag will add it to the list (green)

issues.title: Individual content.json per gallery
issues.body:
Instead of listing all optional files in the root content.json, split it up per gallery.

* content.json (root, lists files such as main.js index.html etc.)
* galleries/
 * content.json (includes every gallery's content.json)
 * gallery/
   - content.json (lists manifest.json and all images in that gallery)
   - manifest.json

This will make hub management slightly more complicated, but it will also allow for far bigger hubs as well as swift re-signing of metadata changes to a single gallery.
